main: ^To the right of me is Mossel Bay, its where we get our fresh ingredients from. You will find ingredients hidden within objects. When you INTERACT (left-click) with an object there will be a chance that an ingredient will pop out!
^So do all objects have ingredients in them?
^Not all of them boytje! But thats foraging you see? It takes a lot of patience and you cannot leave any stone unturned!
